channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenKM -- OpenKM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenKM -- OpenKM

item.title: CVE-2022-47413|2024-08-03T14:55:08.378Z -- openkm -- openkm
item.description: Given a malicious document provided by an attacker, the OpenKM DMS is vulnerable to a stored (persistent, or "Type II") XSS condition.

item.title: CVE-2022-47414|2024-08-03T14:55:07.965Z -- openkm -- openkm
item.description: If an attacker has access to the console for OpenKM (and is authenticated), a stored XSS vulnerability is reachable in the document "note" functionality.
